data.name: FHIR Output Create
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setHeader name="CamelFhir.resourceAsString">
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe resource_params.resource}}]]>
        </simple>
    </setHeader>
    <to uri="fhir://{{api}}/{{method}}?serverUrl={{serverUrl}}&{{querystring fhir_params extra_query_params true}}" />
    {{#if (eq output_format "json")}}
        {{applyMarshal "fhirJson" fhir_params}}
    {{/if}}
    {{#if (eq output_format "xml")}}
        {{applyMarshal "fhirXml" fhir_params}}
    {{/if}}

    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
